title: Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description:
When adding content, the localization key cannot be left blank. If the key is blank, the externalized text will not be displayed in the chart. To reproduce this issue, perform the following steps: 

1. Set the key blank in the properties file, but provide a valid value.

Observed Behavior: The externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.

Expected Behavior: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.
OB: The externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.
SR: To reproduce the issue, set the externalized text in the chart title.
